body:
@andrewchambers: That seems like a good idea. Getting some quantitative measurement of whether this is a sensible change would be useful. What is the best way of performing such a search though?

I've also implemented the proposed change here: https://github.com/jonhoo/tools/compare/singleselect. Any comments are welcome. Unfortunately, the change does require modifying the dead code test data as it uses single-case selects in multiple places.
